description:
Miyako can`t get enough of Yamato and attempts to make him hers, but he`s having none of it.  Why does he keep walking away from Miyako when she obviously cares about him so much? Mayucchi also realizes her feelings towards Yamato and discusses them with Matsukaze...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maji de Watashi ni Moe Nasai!!
真剣で私に萌えなさい!!
